description: Number of one-sided 3-dimensional polyominoes with n cells.
references: W. F. Lunnon, Counting multidimensional polyominoes. Computer Journal 18 (1975), no. 4, pp. 366-367.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
